title: Ore no Imouto ga Konnani Kawaii Wake ga Nai x Toaru Majutsu no Index Movie: Endymion no Kiseki - Kokuchi Eizou

synonyms: OreImo x A Certain Magical Index the Movie: The Miracle of Endymion - Announcement Video
alternative_titles.ja: 俺の妹がこんなに可愛いわけがない。　／　『劇場版 とある魔術の禁書目録 -エンデュミオンの奇蹟-』告知映像

synopsis: A special video shown at screenings of Toaru Majutsu no Index Movie: Endymion no Kiseki to promote the then upcoming second seasons of Ore no Imouto ga Konnani Kawaii Wake ga Nai and Toaru Kagaku no Railgun.
